title: "{TISSUE} {METHOD} {COLUMN} Supplementary Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(useful)
library(Seurat)
library(dplyr)
library(Matrix)
library(ontologyIndex)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

tissue_of_interest = capitalize('{TISSUE}')
filename = paste0(method, '_{TISSUE}_seurat_tiss.Robj')
load(here('00_data_ingest', '10_tissue_robj_downloaded', filename))

annotation = read_csv(here('00_data_ingest', '03_tissue_annotation_csv', '03_tissue_annotation_csv', paste0(tissue_of_interest, '_{METHOD}_annotation.csv')))

for (column in colnames(annotation)){
  tiss@meta.data[annotation$X, column] = annotation[column]
}

genes_to_check = sort(c({GENES}))
```

```{r}
DotPlot(tiss, genes_to_check, col.max = 2.5, plot.legend = T, do.return = T) + coord_flip()
```

```{r}
TSNEPlot(object = tiss, do.return = TRUE, group.by = "{COLUMN}")
```

```{r}
RidgePlot(tiss, genes_to_check)
```
